allowed_changes: Add new primitives; mark deprecated; add replaced_by mapping; add new facets.
forbidden_changes: Rename IDs; repurpose IDs; reorder primitive index map.
notes: Use DEPRECATED instead of deleting to preserve historical builds.
rule: IDs are stable forever; append-only expansion; never reuse meaning.

allowed_changes: Tighten matching rules with version bump; add variant notes; deprecate with replacement.
notes: If matching changes could alter past outputs, require version bump and optionally provide migration note.
rule: IDs stable; logic may be refined but must preserve prior semantics or be deprecated.

allowed_changes: Add clusters; adjust weights with explicit version bump; deprecate clusters.
notes: Weights changes should be documented for scoring differences.
rule: Cluster IDs stable; weights may change with version bump.

allowed_changes: Add buckets; tune K; adjust logic with version bump.
forbidden_changes: Rename ID without alias; remove without replacement.
rule: Stable ID; K values and logic can change with profile/version.
